system.description:
While in a settlement in which you can establish a connection with the government, you can ply your trade as a civil servant (such as campaigning, performing inspections, meetings with important people, or doing office work) to earn yourself an income granting you a rich lifestyle. While plying your trade in this way, you can Gather Information simultaneously at no penalty.

Alternatively, when you Gather Information while not plying your trade in this way, you gain advantage on Persuasion, Deception, and Intimidation checks to draw closer to a political faction or movement.
